
What's new in Flex 2.1.0.0:
  
  RAIL:
    * Updated to RAIL library v2.2.0
    * Added a simple RAIL light and switch application
    * Fixed build issues with RAIL Range Test example application
    * Various bug fixes
  
  Connect:
    * Added MAC Mode Device example applications
    * Added IEEE 802.15.4 MAC security level 4 support
    * Added SimEE v2 non-volitile memory support
    * Various bug fixes
